title: Apaga Apaga Apaga (Ao Vivo)
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Eu acho que cê tem que mandar aquela mensagem
lines.translation: I think you have to send that message.
lines.grammar: Verbs: acho, mandar. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I think you have to send that message.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Mas manda o que tá no seu coração
lines.translation: But send what's in your heart.
lines.grammar: Verbs: coração. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'But send what's in your heart.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Porque se fosse eu
lines.translation: Because if it were me
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Because if it were me'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu falaria mais ou menos assim
lines.translation: I would say something like this
lines.grammar: Verbs: mais. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I would say something like this'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Ei, boa noite, antes de te bloquear
lines.translation: Hey, good evening, before I block you.
lines.grammar: Verbs: antes, bloquear. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'Hey, good evening, before I block you.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu só vim te dizer que a partir de hoje
lines.translation: I just came to tell you that starting today
lines.grammar: Verbs: dizer, partir. Prepositions/case: a + article contracts (ao/à); de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'I just came to tell you that starting today'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Pode tocar o terror, fazer o que quiser fazer
lines.translation: You can cause chaos, do whatever you want to do.
lines.grammar: Verbs: tocar, fazer, quiser. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'You can cause chaos, do whatever you want to do.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: A boca é sua, curte suas farra, sinto mais nada
lines.translation: It's your mouth, enjoy your parties, I don't feel anything anymore.
lines.grammar: Verbs: suas, sinto, mais. Prepositions/case: a + article contracts (ao/à). Meaning: 'It's your mouth, enjoy your parties, I don't feel anything anymore.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Não! Apaga, apaga, apaga
lines.translation: No! Delete it, delete it, delete it.
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'No! Delete it, delete it, delete it.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Oi, boa noite!
lines.translation: Hey goodnight!
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Hey goodnight!'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Só vim pedir um tempo
lines.translation: I just came to ask for some time.
lines.grammar: Verbs: pedir, tempo. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I just came to ask for some time.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Pra dar tempo de esquecer
lines.translation: To give time to forget.
lines.grammar: Verbs: dar, tempo, esquecer. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'To give time to forget.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Especialmente hoje
lines.translation: Especially today
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Especially today'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Coração acordou me pressionando pra te ver
lines.translation: My heart woke up urging me to see you.
lines.grammar: Verbs: coração, acordou, pressionando. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'My heart woke up urging me to see you.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Saiu de casa, não posta nada, esconde as farra
lines.translation: She left home, didn't post anything, and hid her partying.
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'She left home, didn't post anything, and hid her partying.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Apaga, apaga, apaga
lines.translation: Delete, delete, delete
